branchCategory.name: LVM15/150, 2/3 Port Solenoid Valve for Chemicals
branchCategory.description: <p>LVM15/150 is a compact direct operated 2/3 port solenoid valve for chemicals. LVM's unique internal chamber design reduces the swept volume to a minimum and can mean zero dead volume and carry over. &nbsp;Operating pressure ranges from -75 kPa to 0.60 MPa. LVM15/150 is available as base mounted with a sub-plate (M6 or 1/4-28UNF).</p>

breadCrumb.name: LVM15/150, 2/3 Port Solenoid Valve for Chemicals
